title: The Flexible Role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You can kill a player at night, dealing a powerful attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- During the role distribution phase, choose 2 extra abilities. If the host decides your abilities are fine, you have both of them along with your attack.
- You can only use 1 ability per night.
- All of your abilities have a 1 night cooldown.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
